category: National Team Athletes’ Village Operation Regulations/Article 7 (Eligible Persons for Entry)
contents: Article 7 (Eligible for entry into the Athletes’ Village) Those eligible to enter the Athletes’ Village and use the Athletes’ Village facilities for training purposes are as follows. Revised 2020. 10. 23. 1. National team players and coaches 2. National team candidates/youth/dream players and coaches 3. National team training partners 4. Self-funded athletes and coaches
